code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./Contact.css";import SocialMedia from"../../components/socialMedia/SocialMedia";import{contactInfo}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Contact(){const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main contact-margin-top",id:"contact",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-div-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"heading contact-title",children:contactInfo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode contact-subtitle":"subTitle contact-subtitle",children:contactInfo.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isDark?"dark-mode contact-text-div":"contact-text-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"contact-detail",href:"tel:"+contactInfo.number,children:contactInfo.number}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"contact-detail-email",href:"mailto:"+contactInfo.email_address,children:contactInfo.email_address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocialMedia,{})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contact-image-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"Saad Working",src:require(`../../assets/images/${isDark?"contactMailDark.svg":"contactMail.webp"}`)})})]})})});}
